api_list.name: create_payment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pay_with_specta.p.rapidapi.com/Purchase/CreatePaymentUrl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pay_with_specta.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
